title: What’s on Google TV: Hulu will lose NBC shows this year, ‘Daredevil’ and others leaving Netflix
content:
Google TV’s goal is to make it easy for you to find the content you want without worrying about what app it’s on. That strength may be put to the test in the coming months, as NBC is preparing to remove its content from Hulu and the Marvel shows, including “Daredevil,” are about to leave Netflix.

more…

The post What’s on Google TV: Hulu will lose NBC shows this year, ‘Daredevil’ and others leaving Netflix appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Netflix confirmed that it will lose its Marvel shows including Daredevil, as Google TV started highlighting Black History Month content.
